Welcome to EmployeeManagement’s documentation!¶

This is an awesome Django Project Boilerplate!!

With this code you can start a complex Django Project very quickly, with just a few steps!

Some of the EmployeeManagement Django Project Boilerplate functionalities are:

  • virtual environments for developing

  • Internationalization and localization to support different languages

  • Project structure

  • HTML5 Boilerplate

  • Template Inheritance

  • Features

  • Project Configuration

To start using the Boilerplate, check out the Introduction and follow the Steps.

Introduction, check out Introduction | Installation, check out Installation Guide | Configuration, check out Configuration | Project Structure, check out Project Structure | Features, check out Features | User Guide, check out User Guide | Admin Guide, check out Admin Journey
